description:
Learn how to transform your life in just 4 short hours....

What do Oprah, Bill Gates, Einstein and Oprah have in common (besides being ultra inspiring people)?

You probably won’t guess it.

Every single one of them kept a JOURNAL

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Inside This Course You'll learn:

• How and why to set up your own Growth Journal

• Why 99% of people are journaling completely wrong

• How use your journal for the "upgraded goal setting workshop" to set inspiring mission centered goals nothing can stop you from achieving. 

• How you can get paid to do what you love (tools to discover what your love)

• Answer the 11 Questions to change your life

…and most importantly…

have some fun along the way!

It doesn’t matter if you work a corporate job, entrepreneur, in college or no job. people just like you reporting more energy, zest and passion for life, happier using this tool.

It doesn’t matter if you’re 15 years old or 70 years old. People from all ages are using this method.

It doesn’t matter if you journal every day or never journals before - testimonials from students using this method to get out of depressive slump, conquered anxiety - break past limiting beliefs.

Anyone can journal, but not everyone can use it as a tool to fast track personal development.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Why you should enroll:

Over 350,000 students have discovered this journaling system!

Course includes over 4 hours of high quality content, including workshops, PDFs, Mp3s, complete book list and access to an exclusive Udemy Q+A support.

You'll have direct access to the instructor, who has over 6 years using this exact journal method and hundreds more as a coach and avid learner.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

About the instructor:

Top rated self-growth YouTube Channel with over 300 videos and 11,000 subscribers

Experience working with and coaching all ages (11-55).

All videos by the instructor have are rated an average of 95% positive viewer feedback.

+ Host of top Ranked iTunes self-help podcast grossing over 2 Million downloads.

+ Passionate about journaling and helping others achieve their goals.

+ Would select “Animal” from the Muppets as his spirit animal.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Course Overview:

LESSON 1: Why Journal?

LESSON 2: Setting up your journal for maximum success

LESSON 3: BOOK NOTES SECTION

LESSON 4: GRATITUDE SECTION

LESSON 5: GROWTH SECTION (+ Upgraded goal setting workshop)

LESSON 6: BRAIN DUMP SECTION

LESSON 7: FREEDOM SECTION

LESSON 8: ONLINE NOTES SECTION

LESSON 9: SUPPLEMENT SECTION

WORKSHOP 1: The 10 Books You Must Read

WORKSHOP 2: The 11 Questions That Will Change Your Life

WORKSHOP 3: The 6 Best Journal Exercises

WORKSOP 4:  Other Methods to Consider

BONUS 1: Journal Flip Though Pt. 1

BONUS 2: Journal Flip Through Pt. 2

BONUS 3: Top 3 Mistakes When Starting A Journal

BONUS 4: The Greatest 25 Quotes of All Time
title: The Ultimate Guide to Keeping A Journal
